Subjects randomly assign ( 1:1 ratio ) treatment single administration AC607 placebo ( approximately 100 subject per group ) . Safety efficacy assessment perform daily post-operative hospital stay day randomize study discharge , 30 day , 90 day study drug administration ( evaluation phase ) . Safety long-term clinical outcome assess 6 , 12 , 24 36 month ( long-term follow-up phase ) .
